name: Now by RAVE 100 ml
category: MEN'S ARABIC PERFUMES , UNISEX ARABIC PERFUMES , RAVE
tags: ARAB PERFUME RAVE , ARAB PERFUME RAVE NOW , RAVE PERFUME , PERFUMES , ARAB PERFUMES , ORIGINAL ARAB PERFUMES , RAVE , RAVE NOW
longDescription: Rave Now is an oriental men's perfume, with a strong and intriguing aroma. Top notes of mandarin, lemon and spices give a fresh and energizing scent. The middle notes of amber, floral notes and pralines add a sweet and indulgent air. The base notes of patchouli, tonka bean, cedar wood and sandalwood provide a warm and comfortable fragrance that will last all day. Rave Now is perfect for men who want to feel strong and confident in their own skin. This perfume has an impressive persistence, which can be felt for up to 8 hours on the skin and even 16 hours on clothes. Its elegant packaging makes it easy to transport, being perfect for those who love to be on the move. Rave Now is an excellent choice for men who want to distinguish themselves with their perfume and attract the attention of those around them.

imagesDetail.name: Now by RAVE 100 ml
Now by RAVE 100 ml

name: Yara by Lattafa Perfumes 100 ml
longDescription: Yara is an oriental Arabic perfume for women, manufactured by the great manufacturer Lattafa. This perfume has a sweet and fresh aroma, with a slight powdery accent. The top notes are heliotrope, orchid and mandarin, which give a fresh and delicate fragrance. The middle notes are Gourmand Accord and tropical fruits, which add an exotic and delicious air. The base notes are vanilla, sandalwood and musk, which offer a warm and comfortable fragrance that will last throughout the day. Yara is perfect for women who want to feel special and elegant.
